mapper.select: SELECT I.IQC_NO, I.IQC_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMP_ID, I.QCM_NAME, M.MTL_NAME, I.IQC_START_TIME, I.IQC_END_TIME, I.RECEIVED_QTY, I.UNIT_QTY, I.IQC_MEASURED_WEIGHT_VALUE, I.IQC_MEASURED_LENGTH_VALUE, C_UNIT_LENGTH.CMN_DETAIL_NAME AS QCM_UNIT_LENGTH, C_UNIT_WEIGHT.CMN_DETAIL_NAME AS QCM_UNIT_WEIGHT, I.IQC_INSPECTION_STATUS, I.IQC_INSPECTION_RESULT, I.WHS_NAME, I.LOT_NO, I.IQC_REMARKS, I.RECEIPT_CODE FROM IQC I LEFT JOIN COMMONCODE_DETAIL C_UNIT_LENGTH ON C_UNIT_LENGTH.CMN_DETAIL_NAME = I.QCM_UNIT_LENGTH LEFT JOIN COMMONCODE_DETAIL C_UNIT_WEIGHT ON C_UNIT_WEIGHT.CMN_DETAIL_NAME = I.QCM_UNIT_WEIGHT LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON E.EMP_ID = I.EMP_ID JOIN MATERIALS M ON M.MTL_CODE = I.MTL_CODE WHERE I.IQC_VISIABLE = 'Y' ORDER BY IQC_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE IQC SET IQC_INSPECTION_STATUS = #{iqcInspectionStatus}, IQC_INSPECTION_RESULT = #{iqcInspectionResult}, IQC_CODE = #{iqcCode}, QCM_NAME = #{qcmName}, EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_ID = #{empId}, MTL_NAME = #{mtlName}, RECEIVED_QTY = #{receivedQty}, UNIT_QTY = #{unitQty}, IQC_MEASURED_WEIGHT_VALUE = #{iqcMeasuredWeightValue}, QCM_UNIT_WEIGHT = #{qcmUnitWeight}, IQC_MEASURED_LENGTH_VALUE = #{iqcMeasuredLengthValue}, QCM_UNIT_LENGTH = #{qcmUnitLength}, IQC_START_TIME = #{iqcStartTime}, IQC_END_TIME = #{iqcEndTime}, WHS_NAME = #{whsName}, IQC_REMARKS = #{iqcRemarks} WHERE IQC_NO = #{iqcNo}
mapper.select: SELECT RECEIPT_CODE, RECEIPT_NO, MTL_CODE, RECEIVED_QTY, WAREHOUSE_CODE FROM MATERIAL_RECEIPT WHERE RECEIPT_CODE = #{receiptCode}
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(IQC_CODE, 14))), 0) FROM IQC WHERE SUBSTR(IQC_CODE, 5, 8) = #{datePart}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IQC ( IQC_INSPECTION_STATUS, IQC_INSPECTION_RESULT, IQC_CODE, RECEIPT_CODE, RECEIPT_NO, MTL_CODE, RECEIVED_QTY, UNIT_QTY, IQC_VISIABLE ) SELECT '검사시작', '예정', #{iqcCode}, #{receiptCode}, #{receiptNo}, #{mtlCode}, #{receivedQty}, '개', 'Y' FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM IQC WHERE RECEIPT_CODE = #{receiptCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE IQC SET IQC_INSPECTION_STATUS = '검사중', EMP_NAME = #{emp.empName}, EMP_ID = #{emp.empId}, IQC_START_TIME = #{iqc.iqcStartTime} WHERE IQC_CODE = #{iqc.iqcCode}
mapper.select: SELECT Q.QCM_MIN_VALUE, Q.QCM_MAX_VALUE, Q.QCM_UNIT_WEIGHT, Q.QCM_UNIT_LENGTH FROM IQC I JOIN QCM Q ON I.QCM_NAME = Q.QCM_NAME WHERE I.IQC_CODE = #{iqcCode}

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN IQC_INSPECTION_RESULT = '합격' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS passCount, SUM(CASE WHEN IQC_INSPECTION_STATUS = '검사중' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS inProgressCount, SUM(CASE WHEN IQC_INSPECTION_RESULT = '불합격' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS failCount FROM IQC WHERE IQC_START_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 6 AND IQC_START_TIME <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) + 1 ORDER BY TO_CHAR(IQC_START_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT TO_CHAR(IQC_START_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') AS iqcDate, SUM(CASE WHEN IQC_INSPECTION_RESULT = '합격' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS passCount, SUM(CASE WHEN IQC_INSPECTION_STATUS = '검사중' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS inProgressCount, SUM(CASE WHEN IQC_INSPECTION_RESULT = '불합격' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS failCount FROM IQC WHERE IQC_START_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 6 AND IQC_START_TIME <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) + 1 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(IQC_START_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(IQC_START_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD')
